movies.title: Marie Antoinette
movies.plot: The retelling of France's iconic but ill-fated queen, Marie Antoinette. From her betrothal and marriage to Louis XVI at 15 to her reign as queen at 19 and ultimately the fall of Versailles.

events.title: Marie Antoinette marries the Dauphin of France, Louis-Auguste
Marie Antoinette gives birth to a baby girl, Marie Thérèse Charlotte
Marie Antoinette gives birth to Louis-Joseph
Marie Antoinette gives birth to Louis-Charles
Marie Antoinette gives birth to Sophie
the royal family escape to Tuileries Palace
